project.name: fixture
project.description: A non-java JVM application (using Spring, Hibernate, SLF4J, EhCache, Kotlin) for the non-CSS and non-Javascript web (using SASS and CoffeeScript).

bannedDependencies.message: Use slf4j and jcl-over-slf4j and log4j-over-slf4j instead

requireJavaVersion.message: Use JDK 1.7.0-06 or above to build

requireMavenVersion.message: Use Maven 3.0.4 or above to build

requirePluginVersions.message: Define plugin versions via <pluginManagement> to explicitly define versions

requireReleaseDeps.message: Update all dependencies to release versions when releasing

requireUpperBoundDeps.message: Define non-up-to-date dependencies via <dependencyManagement> to ensure (atleast) the upper bound is used
